      def ls_tree(sha, paths = [])
        if paths.size > 0
          # pathing
          part = []
          paths.each do |path|
            part += ls_tree_path(sha, path)
          end
          return part.join("\n")
        else
          get_raw_tree(sha)
        end
      end
